reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The objective of the Agency?s Nuclear Security Programme is: a)To contribute to global efforts to achieve effective nuclear security, by establishing comprehensive nuclear security guidance and, upon request, promoting its use through peer reviews and advi sory services and capacity building, including education and training; b) To assist in adherence to, and implementation of, relevant international legal instruments, and in strengthening the international cooperation and coordination of assistance; and c) To play the central role and enhance international cooperation in nuclear security, in response to the priorities of Member States expressed through the decisions and resolutions of the Agency?s Policy Making Organs. Only the estimated share of benefits go ing to developing countries reported as ODA.

The objective of the Agency?s Nuclear Security Programme is: a)To contribute to global efforts to achieve effective nuclear security, by establishing comprehensive nuclear security guidance and, upon request, promoting its use through peer reviews and advi sory services and capacity building, including education and training; b) To assist in adherence to, and implementation of, relevant international legal instruments, and in strengthening the international cooperation and coordination of assistance; and c) To play the central role and enhance international cooperation in nuclear security, in response to the priorities of Member States expressed through the decisions and resolutions of the Agency?s Policy Making Organs. Only the estimated share of benefits go ing to developing countries reported as ODA.
